channel.title: plots on D-G-V-J
channel.description: Recent content in plots on D-G-V-J

item.title: Nuances of $\LaTeX$ typesetting: p for plots
item.description: It is almost always required to make some plots if you are presenting data. In this article, we will explore a few ways to make your plots production quality and integrate it with your articles. Among the multiple ways of generating plots, we will explore three using python-matplotlib using gnuplot using pgfplots package Plots using python-matplotlib I am using python and matplotlib combo because I think this might be the most widely used combo for plotting.
